http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab.@value: "On November 18-19, 2016, the European Academy of Sciences organized a conference devoted to the theme 'Progress in Science, Progress in Society', in cooperation with the Académie royale de Belgique. The conference took place at the Palais des Académies in Brussels, Belgium. We are glad to publish the proceedings of this conference for the general public"--Print version, page vii.
